#### Info

Replica of example [repo](https://github.com/provenstyle/Using-ConfigurationSection) showing using `System.Configuration` `ConfigurationSection` `ConfigurationElementCollection` and `ConfigurationElement` converted from C# 6.x to 5.x syntax (replaced the fancy lambda [Expression body definition](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/operators/lambda-operator#expression-body-definition) with a plain getter) combined with code example from [article](https://www-jo.se/f.pfleger/custom-config-cdata/) illustrating using `CDATA` in custom `ConfigurationSection`
